form.enabledHelp: If "Enabled" SCM-Manager uses CAS for authentication. "Disabled" allows convential authentication.
form.urlHelp: Url of CAS installation (with context path).
form.acceptAnyProxyHelp: Specifies whether any proxy is OK
form.allowedProxyChainsHelp: Each acceptable proxy chain should include a space-separated list of URLs (for exact match) or regular expressions of URLs (starting by the ^ character). Each acceptable proxy chain should appear on its own line.
